2015-04-06-进程间通信

Apr 6, 2015

#引子

from multiprocessing import Process, Queue
import os, time, random

def write(q):
    for value in ['A' ,'B', 'C']:
        print 'Put %s to queue ...' % value
        q.put(value)

def read(q):
    while True:
        value = q.get(True)
        print 'Get %s from queue..' % value

if __name__ == '__main__':
    q = Queue()
    pw = Process(target=write, args=(q,))
    pr = Process(target=read, args=(q,))

    pw.start()
    pr.start()
    pw.join()
    time.sleep(3)
    pr.terminate()
